div.p: Order is a field in the Bibliography Database which records the order in which the authors' names will appear in the final bibliographic citation. This field is filled only for multiply-authored texts.

If the final citation should read James W. Marquart, Sheldon Ekland Olson, and Jonathan R. Sorenson, then enter each author name (lastname, firstname, if the standard form is firstname lastname) in bibliography, in the STANDARDNAME field. If you enter (from this example) Sorenson before Marquart, then you will need to change the numbers in the ORDER field. You only need to use ORDER if you have more than one of each Link Type. If you have one monographic author and one subsidiary editor, for example, you do not need to specify the order of the names because these names will appear in different parts of the citation.
